reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is true to size, with one noting it's particularly suitable for short people.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very well made
items.body: material is very sturdy and has a zipper in the back, very well made, the style is flattering, the length is perfect not too long, I purchase Black in a size Large it fit perfect. This dress would be great for any dressy occasion. Read more
items.author: victoria lynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Last Minute, Perfect purchase!
items.body: I was invited to a Black Tie event 2 days before the event took place and needed a dress asap! I was panicked and trying to find a dress that I would be comfortable in, was made with quality material and looked elegant. When I ordered this dress, it was initially a back up dress. It arrived two hours before the event, but when I pulled it out of the bag I was immediately impressed. It checked all of the boxes and was perfect for the event. I did not have time to wash it before I wore it (I know, I know) but it did not have a nasty chemical smell and had minor wrinkles. I steamed it within 30 mins, put the dress on and instantly felt beautiful. I was comfortable even when sitting & eating dinner, the slit in the dress offered some elegant charm. I paired it with some silver glitter heels, which looked super cute. I got many compliments, despite being a last minute dress. This dress did not disappoint!! Read more
items.author: AllyM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress saved my evening!
items.body: This dress is one of my biggest Amazon wins of all time. Tonight I attended a military gala with my husband, and tried on my current dresses, last night, the night before. Nothing fit. At 11:45 pm I ordered this dress according to the size chart with next day shipping. Worked all day and slipped into this with 30 minutes left until we needed to leave. It fit so well, the fabric is soft, but substantial enough to drape well. The neckline is just right and stays put without tacking. I did quickly tack the slit shut about six inches for my own comfort, but this dress is amazing for the price point. It saved me. One of my husband’s buddies arrived with his wife, and she was wearing the same dress! She ordered it even later than I did, with only 6 minutes to spare for next day shipping! We laughed so hard at the coincidence. My advice is buy this dress, but don’t stress yourself out and wait until the night before! I came straight home from the gala tonight to write this review. Terrific dress. Read more
items.author: twofish

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sizing and Length
items.body: I got the recommended size based off of Amazon and it fit perfectly! Everyone loved the dress and honestly I did too. I did wish it was more floor length but it goes right to your ankle Read more
items.author: Alexis Cody

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: I love this dress! Very snuggly, received many compliments! I’m 5’2 and was the perfect length for me. Read more
items.author: Annie Pm

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too short
items.body: Solid dress but if you’re taller than 5 foot 1 inch, it would be too short for you to wear. I wanted to wear heels with mine and couldn’t so returned it Read more
items.author: AT Hilton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit good
items.body: Very pretty dress. Bought for my granddaughter to wear to a dance. Fit and looked great Read more
items.author: Deb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Wedding Dress
items.body: This was the perfect dress to wear to a formal wedding. It hid all the extra fluff that you want to cover and was a flattering fit. It was true to size and very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Bethany N Bentley

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Split Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Split Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: T-30-sleeveless Red-2, Pink-t30, Green-t30, Sleeveless Maroon-t30, Sleeveless Black-t30, Black-t30, Burgundy Red-t30, Red-t30, Sleeveless Red-t30, Colored Blue-t30, Sleeveless Aqua-t30, Sleeveless Green-t30. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
